definition: unprecedented/never seen since ancient times
extending all the way across/running all the way through
surname Gu
ancient/old/paleo-
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Building socialism in China is a cause that has not been happened before.
sentences.chinese: 在中国进行社会主义建设是亘古未有的事业。

sentences.english: This is a wonderful achievement without precedent in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国历史上亘古未有的奇绩。

sentences.english: This is the greatest humiliation for the Buddhism and the greatest malignancy intolerable to Buddha Dharma.
sentences.chinese: 这是佛教亘古未有的大耻辱，佛法万劫难容的大邪恶。

definition: never before in the whole of history (idiom)/unprecedented
never before in the whole of history (idiom)/unprecedented/also written 曠古未有|旷古未有
unprecedented and never to be duplicated/the first and the last/unmatched/unique
since the dawn of time/from the year dot
unheard-of/unprecedented
throughout the world/world ranking (e.g. first)
grand event/magnificent undertaking
to surpass all others of its kind before and since/to have neither predecessors nor successors
pinyin: qian2 wu2 gu3 ren2 hou4 wu2 lai2 zhe3

definition: incomparable/none to compare with at that time
pioneering work
one and only (idiom); rarely seen/unique of its kind
for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
vast/great/large amount
the entire country
unrivalled/without peer in this generation
to split heaven and earth apart (idiom); refers to the Pangu 盤古|盘古[Pan2 gu3] creation myth
